pullRequest.title: fix: Use conjunction for dataValueAudit query
pullRequest.bodyText:
https://jira.dhis2.org/browse/DHIS2-1678
Issue: Current data value audit query returns all data if given Period doesn't exist in database.
Expectation: it should return no data if given Period doesn't exist. Also the query should use conjunction conditions.

commit.message: fix: use conjunction for dataValueAudit query
